description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 12/12/2005

Sally tries to cover up the fact that she is not going on a cruise, but in fact she is going in to an old folks home.  Darla discovers that Sally was lying, but refuses to let her go to an old folks home, and she insists that Sally move in with her and Thorne.  Nick wants to tell Bridget about the baby, but Bridget says this is the most stress free she has been in a long time, and she does not want to disturb that.  Nick agrees and does not tell Bridget about his son.  Felicia admits to Stephanie that the doctors did recommend that she stay on chemo but she has not due to her pregnancy.  Stephanie becomes very concerned.
